petsForAdoption.name: Milo
petsForAdoption.description: Milo is very friendly and active, loves to play with people.

petsForAdoption.name: Luna
petsForAdoption.description: Luna is a gentle and docile cat who loves to be petted.

petsForAdoption.name: Rocky
petsForAdoption.description: Rocky has a majestic appearance but a very sweet and loyal personality.

petsForAdoption.name: Bella
petsForAdoption.description: Bella is a graceful cat who loves quiet spaces.

petsForAdoption.name: Lucky
petsForAdoption.description: Lucky is a graceful dog, likes quiet spaces but is active.

petsForAdoption.name: Mimi
petsForAdoption.description: Mimi is a lovely, graceful cat who likes quiet spaces.

successStories.title: Max's Journey to Find a New Home
successStories.story: Max was adopted by a loving family in District 7. Now, the boy has a happy life full of love.

successStories.title: Kitty's new family
successStories.story: Kitty, Abandoned kitten found a home with a young couple. Kitty brought joy to the whole family.

events.title: Pet Adoption Day
events.description: Come and find yourself a loyal companion at our biggest adoption event of the year.

events.title: Free Vaccination Campaign
events.description: We organize free vaccinations for dogs and cats in the community to prevent dangerous diseases.
